card.name: Aragorn and Arwen, Wed
card.text: VigilanceWhenever Aragorn and Arwen, Wed enters the battlefield or attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control. You gain 1 life for each other creature you control.

card.name: Aragorn and Arwen, Wed
card.text: VigilanceWhenever Aragorn and Arwen, Wed enters the battlefield or attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control. You gain 1 life for each other creature you control.

card.name: Frodo, Sauron's Bane
card.text: {W/B}{W/B}: If Frodo, Sauron's Bane is a Citizen, it becomes a Halfling Scout with base power and toughness 2/3 and lifelink.{B}{B}{B}: If Frodo is a Scout, it becomes a Halfling Rogue with "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game if the Ring has tempted you four or more times this game. Otherwise, the Ring tempts you."

card.name: Gandalf the Grey
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell. choose one that hasn't been chosen:• You may tap or untap target permanent.• Gandalf the Grey deals 3 damage to each opponent.• Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.• Put Gandalf on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Gollum, Patient Plotter
card.text: When Gollum, Patient Plotter leaves the battlefield, the Ring tempts you.{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Gollumn from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Radagast, Wizard of Wilds
card.text: Ward {1}Beasts and Birds you control have ward {1}Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, choose one —• Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.• Create a 2/2 blue Bird creature token with flying.

card.name: Reprieve
card.text: Return target spell to its owner's hand.Draw a card.

card.name: Sam, Loyal Attendant
card.text: Partner with Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Frodo into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)At the beigining of combat on your turn, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")Acitvated abilities of Foods you control cost {1} less to activate.

card.name: Samwise the Stouthearted
card.text: FlashWhen Samwise the Stouthearted enters the battlefield, choose up to one target permanent card in your graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Return it to your hand. Then the Ring tempts you.

card.name: Sauron, the Lidless Eye
card.text: When Sauron, the Lidless Eye enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.{1}{B}{R}: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Each opponent loses 2 life.

card.name: The One Ring
card.text: IndestructibleWhen The One Ring enters the battlefield, if you cast it, you gain protection from everything until your next turn.At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life for each burden counter on The One Ring.{T}: Put a burden counter on The One Ring, then draw a card for each burden counter on The One Ring.

card.name: The Shire
card.text: The Shire enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a legendary creature.{T}: Add {G}.{1}{G}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Create a Food token.

card.name: The Shire
card.text: The Shire enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a legendary creature.{T}: Add {G}.{1}{G}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Create a Food token.

card.name: Tom Bombadil
card.text: As long as there are four or more lore counters among Sagas you control, Tom Bombadil has hexproof and indestructible.Whenever the final chapter ability of a Saga you control resolves, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a Saga card. Put that onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Tom Bombadil
card.text: As long as there are four or more lore counters among Sagas you control, Tom Bombadil has hexproof and indestructible.Whenever the final chapter ability of a Saga you control resolves, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a Saga card. Put that onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Trailblazer's Boots
card.text: Equipped creature has nonbasic landwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a nonbasic land.)Equip {2}

card.name: You Cannot Pass!
card.text: Destroy target creature that blocked or was blocked by a legendary creature this turn.
